mapper.sql: next_year_setting_idx, church_code, year, k_part_idx, status, manager_idx, update_date, reg_date
mapper.insert: insert into next_year_setting_status (next_year_setting_idx, church_code, year, k_part_idx, status, manager_idx, update_date, reg_date) values (#{nextYearSettingIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{churchCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kPartIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{managerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into next_year_setting_status
next_year_setting_idx,
church_code,
year,
k_part_idx,
status,
manager_idx,
update_date,
reg_date,
#{nextYearSettingIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{churchCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{kPartIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{managerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update next_year_setting_status
church_code = #{churchCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
k_part_idx = #{kPartIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
manager_idx = #{managerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reg_date = #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where next_year_setting_idx = #{nextYearSettingIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update next_year_setting_status set church_code = #{churchCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, k_part_idx = #{kPartIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, manager_idx = #{managerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reg_date = #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where next_year_setting_idx = #{nextYearSettingIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.k_part_idx kPartIdx, k_part_name kPartName, if(b.status = 'Y' or c.k_part_idx is not null, 'Y', 'N') status from ${church}.k_part a left outer join ohjic.next_year_setting_status b on b.church_code=#{churchCode} and b.year=#{year} and b.k_part_idx=a.k_part_idx left outer join (select year, k_part_idx from ${church}.kGroup group by year, k_part_idx) c on a.k_part_idx=c.k_part_idx and c.year=#{nextYear} where a.active=1
